meanings.definition: Residents or inhabitants of a downtown area.
meanings.sent1: The downtowners enjoy the bustling city life.
meanings.sent2: Many downtowners live in apartments or condos.
meanings.sent3: The downtowners had a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: The downtowners are the heartbeat of the city.
meanings.sent5: The downtowners know all the best local spots.

meanings.definition: People who frequent or visit downtown areas.
meanings.sent1: Tourists often join the downtowners for shopping.
meanings.sent2: The downtowners love exploring new cafes and shops.
meanings.sent3: The downtowners planned a fun night out.
meanings.sent4: The downtowners bring energy to the city streets.
meanings.sent5: The downtowners always find hidden gems in the city.
